sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz' import { Box, Sans, Tooltip } from '../src' export default ({components, ...props}) => {`Tooltip`} {`Lg with left-aligned anchor`} Artsy Collector `} __scope={{props,Box,Sans,Tooltip}}> Artsy Collector {`Lg with centered anchor`} Artsy Collector `} __scope={{props,Box,Sans,Tooltip}}> Artsy Collector {`Lg with right-aligned anchor`} Artsy Collector `} __scope={{props,Box,Sans,Tooltip}}> Artsy Collector {`Sm`} 10 requirements left to publish. `} __scope={{props,Box,Sans,Tooltip}}> 10 requirements left to publish. {`Sm with custom width`} 10 requirements left to publish. `} __scope={{props,Box,Sans,Tooltip}}> 10 requirements left to publish. {`Lg with too much content`} Artsy Collector `} __scope={{props,Box,Sans,Tooltip}}> Artsy Collector {`Lg with too much content and custom width`} Artsy Collector `} __scope={{props,Box,Sans,Tooltip}}> Artsy Collector
